channel.title: Post on In No Particular Order
channel.description: Recent Posts in Post on In No Particular Order

item.title: Creating a Hydroponic Sensor Suite with ESP32
item.author: Francis Liardet
item.description:
This section demonstrates a list view layout. The post listing style can be modified by adjusting the sitemap changeFreq parameter to values like “always”, “hourly”, “daily”, or “weekly”. This section has been set up with the following configuration:

---
title: "Post"
translationKey: post
sitemap:
 changeFreq: "always"
---
